    auditor - audit/verification of regression models

    Installation

    devtools::install_github("mi2-warsaw/auditor")

    Reference Manual

    News

    Quick preview of the assumptions and functions

    Assumption Test Plot
    Homoscedasticity of the residuals Goldfeld-Quandt test_gq Variable vs square root of the absolute value of the residuals plot_test_gq
    Autocorrelation in the residuals Durbin-Watson test_dw Runs Test test_runs i-th residual vs i+1-th residual plot_autocorr
    Outlayers
    Influential observations
    Multicollinearity of variables

    MI^2 (pronounce: Am I square?) is a group of mathematicians and computer scientists that love to play with data. We create tools, do consulting and share our positive attitude.
